original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady at close, rupee at 319.80/95 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at close on Wednesday, while the rupee closed at 319.80/95 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 29.00/75 percent steady from 29.25/75 percent at the last close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2027 closed at 27.50/70 percent, slightly from 27.25/75 percent, on Tuesday’s close.
A one year bill closed at 23.00/25 percent, unchanged from the last close.
The rupee opened at 319.80/95 against the US dollar in the spot market appreciated from the last close at 320.30/70. (Colombo/May03/2023)
